title: How to See Mutual Friends on Snapchat by Looking at Quick Add

steps.title: Tap the add button.
steps.content: Tap the add button. This is the icon with a person next to a plus symbol. It’s in the top right of the Chat, Camera, and Stories page. [1] X Research source Finding mutual friends is a great way to build your social network if you’ve just created your account .

steps.title: Go to Quick Add.
steps.content: Go to Quick Add. This is a section on the Add Friends page. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Look for mutual friends.
steps.content: Look for mutual friends. When someone on Quick Add has mutual friends with you, you’ll see “# mutual friends” under their username. [3] X Research source You can tap Add next to their name if you want to send them a friend request . Only add people that you know. For more tips, check out our guide on how to stay safe on Snapchat .
